/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/DIPlab3.dir/main.cpp.o  -o DIPlab3   -L/usr/local/cuda/lib64  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_cudev.so.4.5.1
